input_text:
Job Title: Civil Project Engineer – Opportunity for Growth

Location: Detroit, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Civil Project Engineer – Opportunity for Growth in a Leading Organization

Our client, a prominent organization licensed in over 20 states and with six offices across the US, offers a unique opportunity for a Civil Project Engineer seeking professional growth and a challenging work environment. With a portfolio of successful projects that have showcased the organization’s technical expertise and commitment to excellence, our client is positioned as a key player in the engineering field, providing a platform for individuals to advance their careers within the industry.

Benefits

– Wide range of work across multiple states for diverse experience

– Short commute with five offices in the Detroit area

– Opportunity to lead a team of junior engineers, serving as a stepping stone towards a project manager role

Responsibilities

– Lead a team to execute and oversee engineering tasks to successfully complete projects

– Design grading, drainage, and utility piping systems for site improvements

– Conduct hydrology and hydraulic calculations for various piping systems

Requirements

– Bachelor’s in Civil Engineering or equivalent

– Michigan P.E. License or ability to obtain

– Minimum 5 years of engineering experience showing progressively increasing responsibility

Do you have any disability or condition that could affect you in the application and interview process? Please feel free to share this information as part of your application, including any necessary adjustments you might need, so we can help make the process easier for you. We assure you this information will not have any negative effect on the interview process outcome.

About NonStop: We are NonStop, a leading provider of staffing solutions throughout Europe and now also in the US. We’re passionate about connecting talent with opportunity and work non-stop to support our clients in hiring the best talent for their teams. Feel free to pop over to our website, NonStop Consulting, for more information, to browse all our roles, or to let us know how we can help you.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
